title: Classroom Library: Does Third Grade Last Forever; Magic Tree House Haunted Castle on Hollow Eve; Ramona the Pest; Christina's Ghost; the Water Horse; the Magic Finger; One Day in the Tropical Rain Forest; One Day in the Prairie;captain Underpants
description: 36 My Weird School, Miss Holly is too Jolly; Russell and Elisa; Lizzie Logan wears Purple Sunglasses; Ramona the Pest; Ramona and her Mother; Ramona the Brave; Magic Tree House Haunted House on Hollows Eve; The Magic Finger; One Day in the Prairie; Does third Grade Last Forever; (Stepping Stones, Bullseye Step Into Classics) : The Adventures of Tom Sawyer; Knights of the Round Table; The one in the middle is Green; The Classroom at the end of the Hall; Karen's Witch; Sarah Plain and Tall; Mewtwo Strikes Back; Son of a Slime in Cleveland; Cornfield - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -- - - -
author: Dick King-Smith
